de: Kältewellenalarm in ganz Nordindien, einschließlich Delhi-NCR, Indigo-Warnung inmitten von Nebel. Das Wetteramt hat für viele Bundesstaaten, darunter Delhi-NCR, eine Kältewellenwarnung herausgegeben. Es besteht die Möglichkeit eines weiteren Temperaturabfalls ab Montag, der direkte Auswirkungen auf den Straßen- und Flugverkehr haben kann.

en: Cold wave alert in entire North India including Delhi-NCR, Indigo advisory amid fog. The Meteorological Department has issued a cold wave alert for many states including Delhi-NCR. There is a possibility of further drop in temperature from Monday, which may have a direct impact on road and air traffic.

Das Indian Meteorological Department (IMD) hat am Morgen leichten Regen in der Hauptstadt gemeldet.…

en: Dense fog in Delhi: Double attack of fog and pollution, AQI reached 286 in Delhi, airport issued advisory. Dense fog in Delhi: The national capital Delhi remained covered in a blanket of dense fog on Tuesday morning. On January 6, at 6:00 am, visibility was recorded at 200 meters and temperature at 8 degrees Celsius at Delhi Airport. The Indian Meteorological Department (IMD) has reported light rain in the capital in the morning.

Die 6 Ianuarii, hora 6:00, visio facta est in 200 metris et temperatura ad 8 gradus Celsius apud Delhi Airport. Indicus Meteorologicus Department (IMD) pluviam lucem in capite mane retulit.

de: Die Geschichte dieses Grönlands, das weder „grün“ noch „Land“ ist...! Die Geschichte, die mit zwei Morden begann, ist mittlerweile zum Schlachtfeld der Supermächte geworden. en: The story of that Greenland, which is neither 'green' nor 'land'...! The story of which started with two murders, has now become the battlefield of superpowers. The world's largest island, which can accommodate several states of India, but has the population of a small city. Here, in the dark of night, the sky glows with magical green lights and sometimes the sun forgets to set here for months. The interesting thing is that the name of this island is…
la: Historia illius Groenlandiae, quae nec "viridis" nec "terra" est. Fabula, quae duobus caedibus orta est, iam pugna superpotentia facta est. Insulae mundi maximae, quae complures civitates Indiae accommodare possunt, sed incolas urbis parvae habet. Hic in tenebris noctis, magicis luminibus virentibus rutilat caelum, et interdum sol hic menses cedere obliviscitur. Iucundum est quod nomen huius insulae est…

de: Delhi AQI: Das neue Jahr begann in Delhi mit giftiger Luft und Nebel, AQI überschritt 473; IMD gab Regenalarm heraus. Delhi AQI Today: Der erste Morgen des Jahres 2026 hat für die Bewohner von Delhi-NCR einen „Gesundheitsnotstand“ statt Erleichterung gebracht. Heute, am 1. Januar, herrscht in der Hauptstadt dichter Nebel und extrem giftige Luft. Die Situation ist, dass die Sichtweite in Gebieten wie Palam und Safdarjung weniger als 50 Meter beträgt.

en: Delhi AQI: New Year started in Delhi with poisonous air and fog, AQI crossed 473; IMD issued rain alert. Delhi AQI Today: The first morning of the year 2026 has brought 'health emergency' instead of relief for the residents of Delhi-NCR. Today, on January 1, the capital is in the grip of dense fog and extremely poisonous air. The situation is that visibility in areas like Palam and Safdarjung is less than 50 meters.
la: Delhi AQI: Novus Annus in Delhi aere et nebula venenoso coepit, AQI 473 transiit; Imd latis imbres intenti. Delhi AQI Hodie: Primum mane anni 2026 pro subsidio salutis incolas Delhi-NCR attulit. Hodie, Kalendis Ianuariis, caput densae nebulae et aeris venenosi admodum in manibus est. Locus est, quod visio in locis sicut Palam et Safdarjung minor est quam 50 metra.

de: Machen Sie sich auf schwere Erkältungen in Nordindien gefasst! Merkur wird mit dichtem Nebel herabsinken, warnt das IMD. Kältewellenwarnung: Das Indian Metrological Department (IMD) hat am Donnerstag (8. Januar) eine Warnung vor schwerer Kälte in Nordindien herausgegeben. Das Wetteramt hat auch vorhergesagt, dass es in vielen Teilen Nordindiens regnen wird, darunter Punjab, Haryana, Chandigarh, Delhi-NCR und UP.

en: Get ready for severe cold in North India! Mercury will fall with dense fog, IMD issues warning. Cold wave alert: The Indian Metrological Department (IMD) has issued a warning of severe cold in North India on Thursday (January 8). The Meteorological Department has also predicted that there will be rain in many parts of North India including Punjab, Haryana, Chandigarh, Delhi-NCR and UP.
la: Parate grave frigus in India Septentrionali! Mercurius densis cadet nebula, IMD prodit admonitio. Fluctus frigidus vigilans: In Indian Metrological Department (IMD) monitionem gravem frigoris in India septentrionali die Iovis (VIII Ianuarii). Department Meteorologicum etiam praedixit pluviam in multis partibus Indiae septentrionalis, inter Punjab, Haryana, Chandigarh, Delhi-NCR et UP.

en: Gurugram Cold Wave: Cold havoc in Gurugram! Mercury dropped by 0.6 degrees Celsius, IMD issued orange alert. Gurugram Cold Wave: It is extremely cold in Gurugram of Haryana and Bathinda of Punjab. The temperature at both places fell by 0.6 degrees Celsius on Sunday night. The Meteorological Department said that in both Gurugram and Bathinda on the night of Sunday (January 11), the highest level of this season so far…
